name: virtual-thing
description: Creates and deploys a virtual thing based on its TD
author: Hassib Belhaj <https://github.com/hasbel>

scripts.preinstall: rm -rf thingweb.node-wot && rm -rf node-modules && rm -rf package-lock.json
scripts.get-node-wot: git clone https://github.com/hasbel/thingweb.node-wot && cd thingweb.node-wot && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install-node-wot: mkdir -p node_modules/@node-wot && mv thingweb.node-wot/packages/* node_modules/@node-wot/ && rm -rf thingweb.node-wot
scripts.postinstall: npm run get-node-wot && npm run install-node-wot
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run start
